meanings.definition: A sizzler is a hot iron plate used for cooking and serving food.
meanings.sent1: The sizzlers at the restaurant make a loud sizzling sound.
meanings.sent2: We ordered the sizzlers, and they arrived at our table still sizzling.
meanings.sent3: The sizzlers were so hot that they made the whole table vibrate with their sizzle.
meanings.sent4: The sizzlers on the plate seemed to dance with excitement as they sizzled away.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the sizzlers filled the room, making everyone's mouth water.

meanings.definition: Sizzlers can refer to a type of food, typically consisting of grilled meat or vegetables served on a sizzling hot plate.
meanings.sent1: The sizzlers on the menu are always a popular choice among customers.
meanings.sent2: I love the sizzlers at this restaurant; they are always so flavorful.
meanings.sent3: The sizzlers looked so delicious that I couldn't resist taking a bite before they cooled down.
meanings.sent4: The sizzlers sizzled on the plate like a mini barbecue right at our table.
meanings.sent5: The sizzlers were so hot that they seemed to be cooking right in front of us.

meanings.definition: Sizzlers can also refer to a type of dish or meal that is served on a sizzling hot plate.
meanings.sent1: The sizzlers at the party were a big hit with all the guests.
meanings.sent2: She prepared the sizzlers with care, ensuring they were cooked to perfection.
meanings.sent3: The sizzlers were so hot that they almost set off the fire alarm.
meanings.sent4: The sizzlers sizzled on the plate, tempting everyone with their aroma.
meanings.sent5: The sizzlers were the star of the meal, drawing everyone's attention with their sizzle.
